ingredients:
1.5 oz bourbon
.75 oz sweet vermouth
.75 oz Campari
instructions: Stir all ingredients over ice. Strain into an old-fashioned glass over 1 large cube. Garnish with a cherry.

ingredients:
1.5 oz cognac
1 oz creme de cacao
1 oz heavy cream
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with grated nutmeg.

ingredients:
1 oz Campari 
1 oz sweet vermouth
 4 oz seltzer
instructions: Pour Campari and sweet vermouth into a glass. Add ice and soda water.

ingredients:
2 oz Aperol
3 oz sparkling wine 
2 oz seltzer
instructions: Pour the Aperol into a wineglass. Fill the glass with ice cubes, then pour in the sparkling wine and seltzer. Mix gently with a bar spoon. Garnish with a grapefruit wedge.

ingredients:
2 oz gin
.75 oz dry vermouth
instructions: Stir all ingredients over ice. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with an olive or express a lemon peel over the drink and set it on the side of the glass.

ingredients:
.75 cognac
.75 oz white rum 
.75 oz Cointreau
.75 oz lemon juice
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe.

ingredients:
1.5 oz Cognac
.75 oz demerara syrup
1 whole egg
instructions: Shake all ingredients without ice. Shake again with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with grated nutmeg.

ingredients:
2 oz Cognac
.5 oz Green Chartreuse
.75 oz lemon juice
.5 oz simple syrup
1 dash angostura bitters
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe. Express the lemon twist over the drink then set it on the edge of the glass.

ingredients:
1 mint bouquet
2 oz bourbon
.25 oz simple syrup
instructions: Rub the interior of the julep tin with the mint bouquet and then set it aside. Add the bourbon and syrup and fill the tin halfway with crushed ice. Stir, churning the ice as you go, for about 10 seconds. Fill the tin with ice until it is about two-thirds full. Stir until it is completely frosted. Add more ice to form a cone over the rim. Garnish with the mint bouquet and serve with a straw.

ingredients:
2 oz gin
3/4 oz lemon juice
3/4 honey syrup
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe.

ingredients:
2 oz apple brandy
.75 oz lime juice
.75 grenadine
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with an apple slice.

ingredients:
.75 oz gin
.75 oz green Chartreuse
.75 oz maraschino liquer
.75 lime juice
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe.

ingredients:
1 oz aged rum
1 oz rum agricole blanc
.75 oz Cointreau
1 oz lime juice
.5 oz orgeat
.5 oz simple syrup
1 dash Angostura bitters
instructions: Shake all ingredients with a small amount of crushed ice. Dump into a double old-fashioned glass. Pack the glass with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint bouquet.

ingredients:
2 oz rye whiskey 
1 oz sweet vermouth
2 dash Angostura bitters
instructions: Stir all ingredients over ice. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with 1 brandied cherry.

ingredients:
2 oz blanco tequila
.75 oz Cointreau
.75 oz lime juice
.75 oz simple syrup
1 lime wedge
kosher salt, for the rim.
instructions: Rub the lime wedge along the rim of the glass. Roll the wet portion of the glass in the salt. Shake the remaining ingredients with ice. Strain into prepared glass.

ingredients:
2 oz bourbon
2 dashes Angostura bitters
1 sugar cube
instructions: Muddle the sugar cube and simple syrup in an old-fashioned glass. Add the bourbon and 1 large ice cube. Stir until chilled. Garnish with lemon & orange twist.

ingredients:
1.5 oz Lillet rose
.5 oz cognac
1 tsp scotch
.75 oz creme de peche
.75 oz lemon juice
.25 oz simple syrup
1 peach wedge
instructions: Muddle the peach wedge in a shaker. Add the remaining ingredients and shake with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a peach wedge.

ingredients:
2 oz gin
.75 oz Cointreau
.75 oz lime juice
1 dash Angostura bitters
1 dash Angostura oragne bitters
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a lime wheel.

ingredients:
1.5 oz gin
.5 oz apple brandy
.5 lemon juice
.5 grenadine
.5 simple syrup
1 egg white
instructions: Shake all the ingredients without ice. Shake all ingredients again with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a cherry.

ingredients:
2 oz Pisco
.5 lime juice
.5 lemon juice
.75 simple syrup
1 egg white
instructions: Shake all the ingredients without ice. Shake all ingredients again with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Carefully garnish the top of the foam with Angostura bitters.

ingredients:
2 oz white rum
.75 oz lime juice
.75 oz simple syrup
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe.

ingredients:
.75 oz gin
.75 oz Lillet blanc
.75 Cointreau
.75 lemon juice
2 dashes absinthe
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe.

ingredients:
2 oz vodka
.75 oz Cointreau
.5 oz lime juice
.5 cranberry juice
.5 oz simple syrup
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a lime wheel.

ingredients:
2 oz white rum
.25 oz lime juice
4 oz Coca-Cola
instructions: Pour the rum into a highball glass and add three ice cubes. Stir for 3 seconds. Add the lime juice and cola and stir once with a bar spoon. Garnish with a lime wedge.

ingredients:
1 oz creme de menthe
1 oz creme de cacao
1 oz heavy cream
8 mint leaves
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a fresh mint leaf.

ingredients:
1.5 oz white rum
.5 oz maraschino liquer
1 oz grapefruit juice
.5 oz lime juice
1 tsp simple syrup
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a lime wheel.

ingredients:
2 oz bourbon
1 tsp maraschino liqueur
1 dash absinthe
1 dash Angostura
1 dash Peychaud's bitters
instructions: Stir all ingredients over ice. Strain into an old-fashioned glass over 1 large cube. Express a lemon twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.

ingredients:
2 oz gin
.75 dry vermouth
.25 oz benedictine
2 dashes Angostura orange bitters
instructions: Stir all ingredients over ice. Strain into a chilled coupe. Express a lemon twist over the drink and then place it on the edge of the glass.

ingredients:
1.5 oz blanco tequila
.5 sweet vermouth
.5 oz dry vermouth
.5 Campari
1 dash Angostura
instructions: Stir all ingredients over ice. Strain into a chilled coupe. Express an orange twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.

ingredients:
absinthe
1.5 oz rye whiskey
.5 oz cognac
1 tsp demerara syrup
4 dashes Petchaud's bitters
1 dash Angostura bitters
instructions: Rinse an old-fashioned glass with absinthe and then dump. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice. Strain into the glass. Express the lemon twist over the drink and discard it.

ingredients:
1.5 oz cognac
1 oz Cointreau
.75 oz lemon juice
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe. Express an orange twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.

ingredients:
2 lemon wedges
1.5 oz bourbon
.75 oz honey syrup
1 dash Angostura bitters
4 oz boiling water
instructions: Combine all ingredients (except the water) in a mixing glass and stir. Pour into a toddy mug, then pour in the boiling water. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

ingredients:
1 oz gin
.5 oz lemon juice
.5 oz simple syrup
4 oz sparkling wine
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except for the sparkling wine) with ice. Strain into a chilled flute. Pour in the sparkling wine and gently mix with a bar spoon. Express a lemon twist over the drink then place it into the drink.

ingredients:
2 oz white rum
1 oz lime juice
.75 simple syrup
1 white sugar cube
10 min leaves
instructions: Gently muddle the mint leaves, simple syrup, and sugar cube in a shaker. Add the remaining ingredients and shake with a small amount of crushed ice. Dump into a Collins glass and add crushed ice until about four-fifths full. Swizzle for a few seconds, then pack the glass with ice. Garnish with mint bouquet then serve with a straw.

ingredients:
2 oz seltzer
2 oz vodka
.5 lime juice
.75 ginger syrup
instructions: Pour the chilled seltzer into a Collins glass. Short-shake the remaining ingredients for about 5 seconds. Strain into the glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes & garnish with a lime wheel.

ingredients:
1 oz gin
1 oz sweet vermouth
1 oz Campari
instructions: Stir all ingredients over ice. Strain into an old-fashioned glass over 1 large cube. Express an orange twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.

ingredients:
1.5 oz aged rum
.75 lime juice
1 oz simple syrup
2 dashes Angostura bitters
6 mint leaves
2 oz champagne
instructions: Shake all ingredients (except the champagne) with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Pour in the champagne and mix gently with a bar spoon. Garnish with a fresh mint leaf.

ingredients:
1.5 oz rye whiskey
.75 dry vermouth
.75 Campari
instructions: Stir all ingredients over ice. Strain into a chilled coupe. Express an orange twist over the drink and then place it into the drink.

ingredients:
2 oz gin
.75oz lime juice
.75 oz simple syrup
1 dash Angostura bitters
instructions: Gently muddle the mint in a shaker. Add the remaining ingredients and shake with ice. Strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with a fresh mint leaf.

ingredients:
2 oz blanco tequila
4 oz orange juice
.25 oz lime juice
.25 oz grenadine
instructions: Combine the tequila, orange juice, and lime juice in a highball glass. Add three ice cubes. Stir for three seconds. Add the grenadine and let it sink to the bottom of the glass. Garnish with half an orange wheel and a lime wedge.

ingredients:
2 ounces rhum agricole blanc
1 tsp sugar cane syrup
1 lime wheel
instructions: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the lime and syrup. Add the rhum and fill the glass with cracked ice. Stir briefly.

ingredients:
2 oz seltzer
2 oz gin
1 oz lemon juice
.75 simple syrup
instructions: Pour the seltzer into a Collins glass. Short-shake the remaining ingredients with ice for about 5 seconds. Strain into the glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Garnish with a lemon wheel and cherry.

ingredients:
2 oz scotch
6 oz seltzer
instructions: Pour the scotch intoa highball glass. Add 3 ice cubes. Stir for 3 seconds. Add the seltzer and stir once. Garnish with a lemon peel.

ingredients:
2 oz bourbon
.75 lemon juice
.75 simple syrup
instructions: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a double old-fashioned glass over 1 large ice cube. Garnish with a lemon wheel and a cherry.

ingredients:
2 oz gin
.5 oz Cointreau
.75 oz lemon juice
.25 simple syrup
1 egg white
instructions: Shake all the ingredients without ice. Shake all ingredients again with ice. Double strain into a chilled coupe. Express a lemon twist over the drink, then place it on the edge of the glass.

ingredients:
1.5 oz gin
1 oz dry vermouth
.75 Suze
instructions: Stir all ingredients over ice. Strain into an old-fashioned glass over 1 large cube. Express an orange twist over the drink, then place it into the drink.
